item.description:
"COMMIT TO BE FIT"
BIGGEST LOSER CHARITY CHALLENGE
NEED TO LOSE WEIGHT?
LIKE A CHALLENGE?
LIKE TO HELP OTHERS?
THEN SIGN UP!!
Start Date: Saturday January 15th (Initial weigh in and meet your trainer!)
I will be at Gold's Gym in Southie 12:30pm-1pm, but if you can't make it then and still want to participate feel free to stop by anytime between 10am and 2pm for the initial weigh in. Just let me know in your RSVP when you plan on going so I know who to be on the lookout for.
End Date: Saturday April 9, 2011 (Final weigh in)
Details: The cost of The Challenge is $199. Each participant will receive:
1 free nutrition consultation
2 free training sessions
Charity Challenge T-Shirt.
Each week participants will be eliminated based on percent of total weight lost. Eliminated participants will receive a parting gift.

Each weekly weigh in will be with your trainer either at Gold's Gym in South Boston or A Healthy Balance in Quincy. It will not be a formal event, but will be one-on-one with your trainer.

The Charity: 50% of the proceeds will be donated to Southie Boys and Girls Club. The other 50% will be donated to the winner's charity of choice.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Commit to be Fit Charity Weight Loss Challenge
